Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI gives near instant feedback that is not possible with teacher. Feedback is more specific with GenAI and I can ask what I want feedback on whereas with teachers it is more general.
